column4: Hello, I wanted to change my name (add an underscore) on the ubuntu wiki and made a bad boo-boo. checked "Disable this account forever" now, how might I go about reversing that? is there someone I can write to?
That is your LaunchPad account isn't it? Can you do it from there?
I didn't see anywhere at launchpad where I could delete an account - only merge them.
